TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ConnectivityStatus extends System.Object
public ref class ConnectivityStatus abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示应用程序网络连接的状态。

span.span: Represents the status of an application's network connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类指定基于 Windows 的应用程序 (使用客户端应用程序服务) 的网络连接。Use the class to specify the network connectivity of Windows-based applications that use client application services. 将属性设置为`true`时, 客户端服务提供程序将使用脱机缓存, 而不是尝试访问相应的 Web 服务。When you set the property to `true`, the client service providers use the offline cache instead of attempting to access the corresponding Web services. 脱机状态存储在每个用户和每个应用程序的基础上。The offline status is stored on a per-user and per-application basis. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：脱机使用客户端应用程序服务](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f792cb16-8520-4a0f-9dc9-07bfbc454e38)。For more information, see [How to: Work Offline with Client Application Services](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f792cb16-8520-4a0f-9dc9-07bfbc454e38). ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此类根据复选框值更新脱机状态。The following example code demonstrates how to use this class to update the offline status depending on a check box value. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序更新脱机状态。In this example, a event handler updates the offline status. 如果用户将应用程序设置为 "联机" 状态, 事件处理程序将尝试重新验证用户。If the user sets the application to the online state, the event handler attempts to revalidate the user. 但是, 如果身份验证服务器不可用, 事件处理程序会将应用程序返回到脱机状态。However, if the authentication server is unavailable, the event handler returns the application to the offline state. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#315)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#315)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsOffline { get; set; }

public: static property bool IsOffline { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsOffline : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示应用程序是否处于脱机模式的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an application is in offline mode.

value.span: 如果应用程序处于脱机模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application is in offline mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性时 , 类会将值缓存到本地文件系统。When you set the property, the class caches the value to the local file system. 命名空间中的客户端服务提供程序将检查此值以确定是否使用脱机数据缓存, 而不是尝试访问[!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)]关联的身份验证、角色和配置文件服务。The client service providers in the namespace check this value to determine whether to use the offline data cache instead of attempting to access the associated [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)] authentication, roles, and profile services. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此属性根据复选框值更新脱机状态。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to update the offline status depending on a check box value. 在此示例中, 事件处理程序更新脱机状态。In this example, a event handler updates the offline status. 如果用户将应用程序设置为 "联机" 状态, 事件处理程序将尝试重新验证用户。If the user sets the application to the online state, the event handler attempts to revalidate the user. 但是, 如果身份验证服务器不可用, 事件处理程序会将应用程序返回到脱机状态。However, if the authentication server is unavailable, the event handler returns the application to the offline state. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#315)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#315)]
